title: Riot Employee join me for 1000 normal win OCE
body:
Hey was wondering if a riot employee on OCE would like to join me for this 1000 win monumental occasion :). Im currently on 998 wins and in a game, ill wait for replys to play another though. Not sure if u guys still do this but may aswell give it a shot. 

Username is Bruceyb 

I'm avaliable whenever.

Thanks alot

replies.body:
I'll play!

Add me in game :)

WOW Good Job on getting a riot employee to play with you . :3 
{{summoner:30}}

Rito is going to make you wait for daaays on 999 wins.

Get tuned son
